message: Let's start fair. I propose a 51/49 split in my favor.  We can always adjust later!
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give you the majority. Take it or leave it!
Okay, I understand your position.  I'm willing to compromise to avoid further losses from inflation.  Let's split it 48/52,  and we can both walk away with something.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal. Take it or leave it!
